did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University International Programs Jordan and Mali Reports
did.abstract: Files from the International Programs department from 1987-1997. Files contain reports and studies on the Jordan project, as well as the Mali Animal Productivity and Export Project. WSU entered the Jordan Project with the aid of the Ministry of Agricultu

bioghist.p: Originally called the Office of International Programs established in 1963 to coordinate and oversee the International Study Abroad programs. This program was reorganized in 1971 resulting in an apparent name change although the tasks of the office remained the same, coordinating programs with foreign student sponsoring agencies and universities. This program also appears to have encompassed NICSA (Northwest Interinstitutional Council on Study Abroad). The program underwent another reorganizing in the late 1980's resulting in the offices present day organization.

scopecontent.p: Files from the International Programs department from 1987-1997. Files contain reports and studies on the Jordan project. WSU entered the Jordan Project with the aid of the Ministry of Agriculture and the Government of Jordan. Files include studies, mail, draft reports, and official reports.
An itemized list of the contents of this collection can be found online here.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.

Boxes are separated based on trip. Box 1 contains files related to the Jordan Project. Boxes 2 and 3 contain files related to the Mali Animal Productivity and Export project. Items mostly contain correspondence, trip reports, and scientific studies related to the projects. Reports are mostly bound.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the Washington State University International Programs Jordan and Mali Reports, 1987-1997 (UA2006-08)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by Jennifer Southwick on June 29, 2006 and retained as UA2006-08.

relatedmaterial.p: Not to confused with an earlier, different, project in Mali.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
